Description: Prosecution case, Mr Ali Witwit, after carrying out unsafe work on the roof of a multi-storey building in Manchester, workers were spotted on the roof of the building without safety measures in place to prevent a fall. An investigation by HSE found that the unsafe work on the roof had taken place over a period of time from 1 January 2019 to 28 February 2019 with a significant risk of death or serious injury.
